output_list.reason: The transfer function allows the contract to be called again before the function execution is complete. This can lead to unexpected behavior and potential loss of funds.
The transferFrom function allows the contract to be called again before the function execution is complete. This can lead to unexpected behavior and potential loss of funds.
The switchLiquidity function allows anyone to switch the liquidity status of the contract. This can lead to unauthorized access and potential loss of funds.
The freezeAccount function allows anyone to freeze an account. This can lead to unauthorized access and potential loss of funds.
The transferOwnership function allows anyone to transfer ownership of the contract. This can lead to unauthorized access and potential loss of funds.
